item.description:
Have you heard of our great comedy shows at the the Pearl in Portsmouth, or the Crestview in Woburn, how about Cobblestones in Lowell? Well, now we're in North Reading!

These Great Comedians presented by Laugh Riot Productions are absolutely hilarious. So come with us and forget about life for a while ......and laugh, laugh, laugh, and laugh some more! You'll feel better when you do!

The fabulous lineup planned includes;

PAUL GILLIGAN & MARK SCALIA

 


Paul Gilligan
Paul Gilligan is one of the most requested comedians in Boston, bringing down the house with an attitude first developed as a high school class clown, and with material culled from his life as a blue collar worker, husband and father. In addition to headlining in Boston clubs, golf tournaments, fundraisers, roasts, and other events, Gilligan is a regular performer at the Riviera Casino in Las Vegas.


Mark Scalia has entertained thousands of people across the United States and Canada at a variety of venues for over twenty years.  Since starting his career in Boston in the early nineties, he’s developed into a strong international headlining comedian as well as a talented actor, being featured in many commercials, television shows and films. His act has been referred to as smart, quick and real – not to mention hilarious.His material, covering subjects such as aging not so gracefully, family quirks and a 10 year relationship, is sharp, funny and something everyone in the audience can relate to.  With a style ranging from G to R, Mark Scalia is a must see act.  For over two decades with his career in entertainment, he looks back with smile, to the future, he grins.


 

--- Price is only $15. for the show! Pay at the door.

--- Plenty of parking available!

--- Restaurant for your dinner before the show!!Check out the Great American Tavern's menu by clicking here.

--- Lounge is open til' 1:00pm!

My Contact # is (603) 759-9876

 

 

(While unusual, due to unforeseen circumstances comedians may change)

This posting, and the information contained within, is not to be copied, modified, edited, or re-posted in any way without the expressed written consent of the "Portsmouth and Beyond" meetup.com Organizer. Thank you for your cooperation!
